ivardefs.name: actor_
ivardefs.desc: Who or what is controlled by this consent. Use group to identify a set of actors by some property they share (e.g. 'admitting officers').

ivardefs.name: category_
ivardefs.desc: A classification of the type of consents found in the statement. This element supports indexing and retrieval of consent statements.

ivardefs.name: consentingParty_
ivardefs.desc: Either the Grantor, which is the entity responsible for granting the rights listed in a Consent Directive or the Grantee, which is the entity responsible for complying with the Consent Directive, including any obligations or limitations on authorizations

ivardefs.name: dataPeriod
ivardefs.desc: Clinical or Operational Relevant period of time that bounds the data controlled by this consent.

ivardefs.name: data_
ivardefs.desc: The resources controlled by this consent, if specific resources are referenced.

ivardefs.name: dateTime
ivardefs.desc: When this  Consent was issued / created / indexed.

ivardefs.name: except_
ivardefs.desc: An exception to the base policy of this consent. An exception can be an addition or removal of access permissions.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: Unique identifier for this copy of the Consent Statement.

ivardefs.name: organization_
ivardefs.desc: The organization that manages the consent, and the framework within which it is executed.

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: The patient/healthcare consumer to whom this consent applies.

ivardefs.name: period
ivardefs.desc: Relevant time or time-period when this Consent is applicable.

ivardefs.name: policyRule
ivardefs.desc: A referece to the specific computable policy.

ivardefs.name: policy_
ivardefs.desc: The references to the policies that are included in this consent scope. Policies may be organizational, but are often defined jurisdictionally, or in law.

ivardefs.name: purpose_
ivardefs.desc: The context of the activities a user is taking - why the user is accessing the data - that are controlled by this consent.

ivardefs.name: securityLabel_
ivardefs.desc: A set of security labels that define which resources are controlled by this consent. If more than one label is specified, all resources must have all the specified labels.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the current state of this consent.
